response.original_title: The Democratic Promise: Saul Alinksy & His Legacy
response.overview: The history of community organizing in America and the role played by Saul Alinksy in the development and practice.
response.tagline: Alec Baldwin narrates the story of legendary community organizer, Saul Alinsky and his modern day legacy.
response.title: The Democratic Promise: Saul Alinksy & His Legacy
